    1: from pandas.core.arrays import IntervalArray
    2: 
    3: 
    4: def test_repr():
    5:     # GH#25022
    6:     arr = IntervalArray.from_tuples([(0, 1), (1, 2)])
    7:     result = repr(arr)
    8:     expected = (
    9:         "<IntervalArray>\n"
   10:         "[(0, 1], (1, 2]]\n"
   11:         "Length: 2, dtype: interval[int64, right]"
   12:     )
   13:     assert result == expected
